title: TTSecurity
title-blurb: Security should not be an afterthought

services.title: 1-Consulting
services.description: We offer to consult on cybersecurity matters ranging from zero-day low-level knowledge to business decisions requiring insight into cybersecurity.

services.title: 2-Penetration Testing
services.description: Our team of certified red-team professionals can give you a penetration test to ensure that you are hardened for this ever-increasing world of cyber threats. Our penetration test includes a report outlining any findings and any suggestions.

services.title: 3-Endpoint Detection
services.description: We help secure your endpoints by constantly monitoring any domains you possess for any weaknesses.

services.title: 4-Inicdent Response
services.description: Was there just an incident? Do you need professionals to assess how much damage was done and how to mitigate the next one? Our team can do all these for you and give you recommendations to avoid the next one.
